DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , randomize , 4-way crossover study healthy participant determine relative bioavailability tablet formulation relative capsule formulation effect high-fat low-fat meal relative bioavailability tablet formulation .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Relative Bioavailability And Food Effect Tablet Formulation GDC-0276 Healthy Participants
DOC.criteria: Body mass index within range 18.0 32.0 kilogram per meter square ( kg/m^2 ) , inclusive , minimum weight 50.0 kg Male participant reproductive potential must willing continue use medically acceptable contraception must avoid sperm donation screen least 90 day last study drug administration Selfreported substance alcohol dependence ( exclude nicotine caffeine ) within past 2 year , and/or participant ever substance alcohol rehabilitation program treat substance alcohol dependence Have use prescription overthecounter ( OTC ) medication supplement within 14 day 5 time elimination halflife ( whichever longer ) Day 1 end participation study Have use vaccine within 7 day GDC0276 administration Female participant positive serum urine pregnancy test breast feed Donation loss 500 milliliter ( mL ) whole blood within 3 month precede entry treatment period Blood transfusion within 30 day precede entry treatment period
